dialogText: Tha' distraction can ge' ya killed, lad. Ya ain't fit to be a pirate.
Well, I enjoy a change of environment sometimes, Captain Savannah...
Who cares? Enough wit' tha'! Where is tha' bastard??
Well, we are suffering some cat-nical issues here... It seems some of our associates are a bit occupied with the fishes in your area...
Ya' useless idiot!!! Wha' the hell can I do wit' tha' crap o' information ya gave me?? Ya all haven' learnt a ting wit me other lives?
There's no need to get violent on that, Captain. You already know the gist of things.
As purrfect as our kin is, we still have our weaknesses, you know...
I am surrounded by idiots... All gonna fall on me shoulders as always...
We are trying our best to get everything under control here...
Shu' up, landlubber!! Don't dare to call me again wit tha' sort of crap stuff!!
